food.title: Quick Chicken Piccata
food.description: These quick and easy pan-fried chicken breasts are topped with a simple pan sauce made with capers, butter, white wine, and lemon juice.
food.author: Chef John

food.title: 15 Greek Grilled Chicken Recipes
food.description: Make restaurant-worthy Greek grilled chicken at home.
food.author: Corey Williams

food.title: Chicken Pot Pie
food.description: Delicious chicken pot pie made from scratch with carrots, peas, and celery.
food.author: Robbie Rice

food.title: Our 20 Best New Chicken Recipes of 2021
food.description: The Allrecipes community flocked to these new chicken recipes, from creamy chicken salad to hot fried chicken.
food.author: Mary Claire Lagroue

food.title: One-Pot Cilantro Lime Chicken Thighs and Rice
food.description: Chicken thighs with cilantro and lime juice and cooked in one dish.
food.author: fabeveryday

food.title: 10 Chicken Salads on the Lighter Side
food.description: These chicken salad recipes rely on wholesome ingredients to create healthy chicken salads that your whole family will love.
food.author: Hayley Sugg

food.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
food.description: A quick and easy dish to prepare, this chicken stir-fry is packed with veggies. Try adding bean sprouts, bamboo shoots, snap peas, or any of your favorite vegetables. Serve it with white or brown rice, or noodles.
food.author: Katie Sechrist

food.title: Air Fryer Apricot-Glazed Chicken Breasts
food.description: Fruit preserves work beautifully for glazing certain meats and fish, and apricot is one of the best for chicken. Serve over white rice.
food.author: lutzflcat

food.title: Kung Pao Chicken
food.description: This sweet, sour, and spicy restaurant favorite is easy to make at home.
food.author: Arlena

food.title: Aussie Chicken
food.description: This recipe is very similar to a chicken dish served at a local well-known restaurant. A friend of mine was kind enough to share it. It includes chicken breasts topped with mushrooms, bacon and cheese cooked in a honey-mustard sauce.
food.author: beckie

food.title: Honey-Garlic Slow Cooker Chicken Thighs
food.description: I have used it often. It's easy and uses pantry staples. Always a hit with adults and kids. Serve with basmati rice or quinoa and steamed or roasted vegetables.
food.author: Myrna
